EmailTemplate.subject: Assure Application Performance with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Turbonomic delivers workload automation for hybrid clouds, simultaneously optimizing performance, cost and compliance in real time. Turbonomic makes sure that workloads always get the infrastructure resources they need when they need them.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/product/]]>
IT Teams who automate with Turbonomic find that they can meet application SLAs, and safely allow the Turbonomic's analytics engine to maintain a continuous state of workload health.
Schedule a Demo <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]> and learn how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
